body_html:
@gunan, thanks for the shout out for a PR. I am a bit clueless as to how to deal with the parameterized_docker_build.sh file. I think I would need someone to hold my hand. Otherwise, if it is as simple as adding something like

ENV TENSORFLOW_VERSION 1.0.0
RUN pip install tensorflow-gpu==$TENSORFLOW_VERSION

then I think I could do that haha.

body:
@gunan, thanks for the shout out for a PR. I am a bit clueless as to how to deal with the parameterized_docker_build.sh file. I think I would need someone to hold my hand. Otherwise, if it is as simple as adding something like 

```
ENV TENSORFLOW_VERSION 1.0.0
RUN pip install tensorflow-gpu==$TENSORFLOW_VERSION
```
 then I think I could do that haha.
